Choose one —
• Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.

Multitude {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this for {5}{U}{U}. When you do, copy it.)
Enchant player
At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

When Unknowable Starspawn enters, target opponent chooses two —
• You gain 4 life and that opponent loses 4 life.
• That opponent sacrifices a creature.
• That opponent discards a card.

cards.rules_text:
First strike, haste
Whenever a player pays an alternate cost, Unrivaled Slayer deals 3 damage to that player. (Multitude and escape costs are alternate costs. So is casting a spell for free.)

Whenever Vanguard Commander enters or attacks, choose one —

• Put a +1/+1 counter on Vanguard Commander.

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn. 
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you're ancient, up to one target land you control becomes a 4/4 green Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. (You're ancient as long as you have eight or more total lands in play or in your graveyard.)

Waking Bog enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{1}{B}{G}: Waking Bog becomes a black and green Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Whenever Waking Bog deals combat damage to an opponent, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Waking Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{3}{W}{B}: Waking Boneyard becomes a white and black Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
When Waking Boneyard dies, if it's a creature, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

Waking Crag enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{2}{R}{W}: Waking Crag becomes a red and white Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Whenever Waking Crag attacks, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

Waking Glen enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{4}{G}{U}: Waking Glen becomes a blue and green Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Whenever Waking Glen deals combat damage to a player, untap each land you control.

Waking Vista enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{1}{U}{R}: Waking Vista becomes a blue and red Elemental creature in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Whenever Waking Vista deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.

Flying
When Whisper of the Dead enters or dies, exile another target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

When Whisperlit Meditation enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
{1}{W}, Sacrifice Whisperlit Meditation: Tap up to two target creatures.
At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, return a creature card with lesser or equal mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.
